gw.api.financials

Class FinancialsCalculations

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.financials.FinancialsCalculations

  • public class FinancialsCalculations
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides instances of FinacialsCalculation that represent a particular Financials calculated amount, such as Available Reserves or Net Total Incurred.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FinancialsCalculator getAvailableReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Available Reserves:

      (Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today)
      -
      (Submitted eroding payments + Awaiting Submission eroding payments for today + Future eroding payments + Pending-approval eroding payments).
      static FinancialsCalculator getAwaitingSubmissionErodingPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Awaiting Submission Eroding Payments:

      (Awaiting Submission payments - Eroding)

      static FinancialsCalculator getAwaitingSubmissionNonErodingPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Awaiting Submission Non-eroding Payments:

      (Awaiting Submission payments - Non-eroding)

      static FinancialsCalculator getAwaitingSubmissionReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Awaiting Submission Reserves:

      (Awaiting Submission reserves for today)
      static FinancialsCalculator getFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression expression)
      Gets a FinancialsCalculator for an arbitrary FinancialsExpression.
      static FloatingFinancialsCalculations getFloatingFinancials()
      Returns an intermediate object "FloatingFinancials" which contains properties for obtaining the FloatingFinancials versions of a FinancialsCalculator.
      static FinancialsCalculator getFuturePayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Future Payments, i.e., Awaiting submission payments whose owning check's scheduled send date is after the current day.
      static FinancialsCalculator getGrossTotalIncurred()
      Deprecated. 
      replaced by getTotalIncurredGross()
      static FinancialsCalculator getNetPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Net Payments:

      Total Payments - Total Recoveries.
      static FinancialsCalculator getOpenRecoveryReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Open Recovery Reserves:

      Submitted recovery reserves
      -
      Submitted recoveries.
      static FinancialsCalculator getOpenReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Open Reserves:

      (Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today)
      -
      (Submitted eroding payments + Awaiting Submission eroding payments for today).
      static FinancialsCalculator getPendingApprovalReserves()
      Create a new calculation packager
      static FinancialsCalculator getRemainingReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Remaining Reserves:

      (Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today)
      -
      (Submitted eroding payments + Awaiting Submission eroding payments for today + Future eroding payments).
      static FinancialsCalculator getRIFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression expression)
      Get expression as a RIFinancialsCalculation.
      static FinancialsCalculator getRINetNetPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Reinsurance Net, Net Payments

      NetPayments - RITotalRecoverables;

      static FinancialsCalculator getRINetNetReserves()
      Returns a FinancialCalculator representing Open Reserves net RI open ceded reserves
      static FinancialsCalculator getRIOpenCededReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsExpression representing Open Ceded Reserves, which is sum of all RICededReserve transactions in Submitting/Submitted status.
      static FinancialsCalculator getRISubmittedNetNetPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Reinsurance Net, Net Submitted Payments

      Submitted NetPayments - RITotalRecoverables;

      static FinancialsCalculator getRISubmittedNetNetReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Reinsurance Net, Net Reserves

      SubmittedOpenReserves - RIOpenCededReserves;

      static FinancialsCalculator getRISubmittedTotalIncurred()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Reinsurance Submitted Total Incurred

      RISubmittedNetNetPayments + RISubmittedNetNetReserves

      static FinancialsCalculator getRITotalCededReservesAdjustments()
      Returns an RIFinancialsCalculation representing Total Ceded Reserves adjustments, which is sum of all RICededReserve adjustment transactions in Submitting/Submitted status.
      static FinancialsCalculator getRITotalCededReservesNonAdjustments()
      Returns an RIFinancialsCalculation representing Total Ceded Reserves non-adjustments, which is sum of all RICededReserve non-adjustment transactions in Submitting/Submitted status.
      static FinancialsCalculator getRITotalIncurred()
      Returns a FinancialCalculator representing the amount paid or to be paid on a claim (payments + open reserves net the amount recovered or to be recovered (recoveries + RI open ceded reserves)
      static FinancialsCalculator getRITotalRecoverables()
      Returns an RIFinancialsCalculation representing Total RIRecoverables, which is sum of all RIRecoverable transactions in Submitting/Submitted status.
      static FinancialsCalculator getRITotalRecoverablesAdjustments()
      Returns an RIFinancialsCalculation representing Total RIRecoverables adjustments, which is sum of all RIRecoverable adjustment transactions in Submitting/Submitted status.
      static FinancialsCalculator getRITotalRecoverablesNonAdjustments()
      Returns an RIFinancialsCalculation representing Total Ceded Reserves non-adjustments, which is sum of all RIRecoverable non-adjustment transactions in Submitting/Submitted status.
      static FinancialsCalculator getRITotalReinsurance()
      Returns an FinancialCalculationBuilder representing Total RI , which is Create a new calculation packager
      static FinancialsCalculator getSubmittedNetPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Net Submitted Payments:

      Payments Submitted - Total Recoveries

      static FinancialsCalculator getSubmittedOpenReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Open Recovery Reserves:

      Reserves - Payments Submitted

      static FinancialsCalculator getSubmittedTotalIncurredNet()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Submitted Total Incurred Net:

      Reserves + Payments Submitted - Total Recoveries

      static FinancialsCalculator getSubmittedTotalPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Payments:

      Submitted payments + Awaiting Submission payments for today.
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalErodingPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Eroding Payments:

      Committed eroding payments + Awaiting submission eroding payments for today.
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalIncurredGross()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Gross Total Incurred:

      Open Reserves + Total Payments.
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalIncurredNet()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Net Total Incurred:

      (Open Reserves + Total Payments)
      -
      Total Recoveries.
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalIncurredNetMinusOpenRecoveryReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Net Total Incurred Minus Open Recovery Reserves (Total Incurred Gross minus Total Recovery Reserves):

      (Open Reserves + Total Payments)
      -
      Total Recovery Reserves.
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Payments:

      Submitted payments + Awaiting Submission payments for today.
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalPaymentsIncludingPending()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Payments with Pending:

      Submitted payments + Awaiting Submission payments for today + Future payments + Pending-approval payments.
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalPaymentsWithPending()
      Create a new calculation packager
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalRecoveries()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Recoveries, which is all submitted recoveries.
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalRecoveryReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Recovery Reserves:

      Total recovery reserves
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Reserves:

      Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today.
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalReservesIncludingPending()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Reserves with Pending:

      Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today + Pending-approval reserves.
      static FinancialsCalculator getTotalReservesWithPending()

      Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getFinancialsCalculation

        public static FinancialsCalculator getFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression expression)
        Gets a FinancialsCalculator for an arbitrary FinancialsExpression. This expression may be a composite expression, i.e. it may consist of multiple financial expressions combined with .plus( ) and/or .minus( )
        Parameters:
        expression - the FinancialsExpression to be encapulated by this calculation.
        Returns:
        a FinancialsCalculator for getting the calculated value represented by the provided FinancialsExpression

      • getRIFinancialsCalculation

        public static FinancialsCalculator getRIFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression expression)
        Get expression as a RIFinancialsCalculation.
        Parameters:
        expression - the FinancialsExpression to be encapulated by this calculation.
        Returns:
        an RIFinancialsCalculator for getting the calculated value represented by the provided FinancialsExpression

      • getOpenReserves

        public static FinancialsCalculator getOpenReserves()
        Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Open Reserves:

        (Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today)
        -
        (Submitted eroding payments + Awaiting Submission eroding payments for today).

        Returns:
        NewFinancialCalculationPackager

        Returns:
        FinancialsCalculator representing the defined calculation.

      • getTotalRecoveries

        public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalRecoveries()
        Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Recoveries, which is all submitted recoveries. The return type of gw.api.financials.FinancialsCalculationRecoveryCategory allows for the calculation to optionally be limited to a specific RecoveryCategory.
        Returns:
        FinancialsCalculator

        public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalPaymentsIncludingPending()

        Returns:
        FinancialsCalculator representing the defined calculation.

      • getRINetNetReserves

        public static FinancialsCalculator getRINetNetReserves()
        Returns a FinancialCalculator representing Open Reserves net RI open ceded reserves
        Returns:
        an RIFinancialCalculator. Use getRIFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression) to turn it into an RIFinancialsCalculation

      • getRITotalIncurred

        public static FinancialsCalculator getRITotalIncurred()
        Returns a FinancialCalculator representing the amount paid or to be paid on a claim (payments + open reserves net the amount recovered or to be recovered (recoveries + RI open ceded reserves)
        Returns:
        an RIFinancialCalculator. Use getRIFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression) to turn it into an RIFinancialsCalculation

      • getFloatingFinancials

        public static FloatingFinancialsCalculations getFloatingFinancials()
        Returns an intermediate object "FloatingFinancials" which contains properties for obtaining the FloatingFinancials versions of a FinancialsCalculator. The intermediate object is used to segregate the floating financials versions from the fixed version of the calculations.
        Returns:
        a FloatingFinancials object. This has only a subset of the calculations that a FinancialsCalculator has: just the ones that are relevant for FloatingFinancials
